sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signin', template: `
CoinSplit

Sign in to your account

Forgot password?

Don’t have an account yet? Sign up

`, styles: [ ] }) export class SigninComponent { showToast=false; onSignIn(){ this.showToast= true; setTimeout(()=>{ this.showToast=false },5000) } }
